Header: Legal action to be taken by the joint opposition against bond issue allegation
Content: MP Bandula Gunawardana said that the Joint Opposition will defend former president Mahinda Rajapaksa in the controversial Central Bank bond scam. MP Gunawardana said, therefore the Joint Opposition will sue Finance Minister Ravi Karunanayake against his recent statement in connection with the particular gazette notification. Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa said recently that he would take legal action against this gazette notification. However Finance Minister Ravi Karunanayake who addressed the media following an event held at the Sri Lanka Customs,Â  queried why the former president does not take legal action against the particular gazette.
